          <title>
            <string language="en">Speed of moving objects</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geschwindigkeit der beweglichen Nachrichten</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Vitesse des objets mobiles</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Velocidade de objetos moventes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Velocità degli oggetti commoventi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ταχύτητα της κίνησης των αντικειμένων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Velocidad de objetos móviles</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration compares the speed of a stone from a catapult (top) and of a bullet from a gun (bottom).</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">damage</string>
          </keyword>

          <keyword>

            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung vergleicht die Geschwindigkeit 
eines Steins von einem Katapult (Oberseite) und der Gewehrkugel von 
einer Gewehr (Unterseite).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration compare la vitesse d'une 
pierre d'une catapulte (dessus) et d'une balle d'un pistolet (bas).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração compara a velocidade de uma 
pedra de uma catapulta (alto) e de uma bala de um injetor (fundo).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione confronta la velocità di 
una pietra da una catapulta (parte superiore) e di una pallottola da 
una pistola (parte inferiore).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση συγκρίνει την ταχύτητα μιας πέτρας 
από έναν καταπέλτη (κορυφή) και μιας σφαίρας από ένα πυροβόλο 
όπλο (κατώτατο σημείο).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración compara la velocidad de una 
piedra de una catapulta (tapa) y de un punto negro de un arma 
(fondo).</string>
          </description>
